channel.title: Sprites wieldable look animation.rscd and itemwieldable.def
channel.description:
i need more information on the wieldable look for adding a new custom sprite . ive added the sprite with all appropriate angles along with inventory image sprite. my last issue is getting it to wield. i need the formula for calculating the wield sprite for itemwieldable and any additional information for animation.rscd that will help solve this.
these are new custom items not existing sprites.
